meanings.definition: To praise too much or excessively.
meanings.sent1: Some parents tend to overpraise their children for every little thing they do.
meanings.sent2: It is important not to overpraise someone as it can lead to unrealistic expectations.
meanings.sent3: The teacher decided to overpraise the student's drawing of a stick figure, causing confusion in the class.
meanings.sent4: Her constant overpraising of her cat made it believe it was the king of the house.
meanings.sent5: The coach's habit of overpraising every player, regardless of their performance, created a lack of motivation in the team.
